Minor Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the minor

ART 319 - Space and Place in Public Art and Urbanism (3)
ART 321 - From the Enlightenment to the Birth of Modernism (1750-1880) (3)

ART 349 - Black, Queer, and Feminist Film (3)
ART 424 - Contemporary Art of the Non-Western World (3)
ART 425 - Writing By and For Artists, Curators, and Critics (3)
ART 428 - History & Theory of the Art Museum (3)
ART 429 - Seminar in Art History & Visual Culture (3)

Complete one course from the following o: ART 324 - History of Film: Origins to 1965 (3)
ART 325 - History of Film and Video: 1965 to Present (3)
ART 327 - History and Theory of Photography (3)
ART 335 - Origins and Issues in Design (3)
